# Aleksandar TodoroviÄ‡ (Personal Blog)

This is the code behind my personal blog hosted on GitHub Pages using Jekyll as a platform. [Visit my blog](http://r3bl.github.io/).

I was previously hosting my blog on [this address](https://aleksandartodorovic.wordpress.com/). If you're wondering how and why have I decided to do the transition, you can read about that [here](http://r3bl.github.io/en/why-switching-to-github-and-jekyll/). If you're wondering why I love GitHub so much, I suggest you to read [this article](http://r3bl.github.io/en/why-github-is-my-favorite-company/) (which I also posted [on Medium](https://medium.com/@r3bl/reasons-why-github-is-my-favorite-technology-related-company-5288d3ac45ad)).

If you find some issues while browsing the site, please refer to [TODO.md](https://github.com/r3bl/r3bl.github.io/blob/master/TODO.md) and check to see if I'm already planning on fixing the issue. If the issue is not mentioned on the list, feel free to report it [here](https://github.com/r3bl/r3bl.github.io/issues).

For any other kind of feedback, feel free to contact me anytime on [aleksandar.todorovic@mail.ru](aleksandar.todorovic@mail.ru). If you care about privacy while sending an email, here is my public PGP key:

-----BEGIN PGP PUBLIC KEY BLOCK-----
Version: GnuPG v1



----- END PUBLIC KEY BLOCK-----


## Credits

I have to give credits to the people who made my website possible. I have only two proprietary features running (one of them is Disqus comments section and the second one is Google Analytics). The rest of the webpage is available thanks to the following projects and people.

* First of all, the amazing theme I'm using is called [HPSTR](https://mmistakes.github.io/hpstr-jekyll-theme/) by @mmistakes.
* Pictures I'm using ATM are the theme's default ones (all of the credits for them goes to [dargadgets](http://www.dargadgetz.com/ios-8-abstract-wallpaper-pack-for-iphone-5s-5c-and-ipod-touch-retina/)). I'm planning on replacing them with my own selection in the near future.
* If you don't know anything about Jekyll, but you're looking for a place to start learning, I have to suggest [this great blog post](http://joshualande.com/jekyll-github-pages-poole/) by @joshualande.
* My previous blog posts were imported from Wordpress to Jekyll using [exitwp](https://github.com/thomasf/exitwp) by @thomasf.

As you can see, in the spirit of open source, this blog is built almost entirely upon- open source projects.
